OBXml:
--- name: jenkins_master packages:
- jenkins_master_war - openjre_8 - fontconfig - ttf_dejavu
- jenkins - openjdk-8 - ttf-dejavu - fontconfig - haproxy - git - maven - route-registrar - jenkins-init-script - ruby - cloudfoundry-cli - syslog_aggregator
- jenkins - jre - nginx - git - cf-cli - bosh-cli - ruby - golang1.3
templates:
# bin/jenkins_master_ctl: bin/ctl bin/jenkins_master_ctl: bin/jenkins_master_ctl
bin/jenkins_master_ctl: bin/jenkins_master_ctl bin/monit_debugger: bin/monit_debugger bin/nginx_ctl: bin/nginx_ctl data/properties.sh.erb: data/properties.sh helpers/ctl_setup.sh: helpers/ctl_setup.sh helpers/ctl_utils.sh: helpers/ctl_utils.sh config/nginx.conf.erb: config/nginx.conf config/mime.types: config/mime.types
properties:
jenkins_master.httpPort: description: HTTP Port default: 8081
jenkins.admin.password: description: Admin user password jenkins.server.internal_http_port: description: "Internal http port between nginx & jenkins" default: 8088 jenkins.server.ajp13_port: description: AJP13 protocal port default: 8009
